original_text: Also one male goat for a sin offering to the Lord; it shall be offered besides the regular burnt offering and its drink offering.
korean_text: 또 상번제와 그 전제 외에 숫염소 한 마리를 속죄제로 여호와께 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Also one male goat for a sin offering to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 주께 속죄제물로 수염소 한 마리를

sentences.original_text: it shall be offered besides the regular burnt offering
